Posts.Content: Thank you for the info .To tell you a bit this.I went to my regular doctor for a exam he spotted a lump in my left breast.He then sent me to have a mammogram done this was when something was spotted.The doctor that performed the mammogram requested that a ultra sound be done.Went had this done went back to my docs and requested to speak with a surgeon (due to my family history)he was not wanting me to do this as he felt it was just a B9 cyst.At my insistence he gave in and referred me to Doctor Morey here in Port Huron.Doctor Morey then performed the biopsy herself and that is when i got a call back to come back in due to abnormal cell findings is what i was told . If i had listened to my regular Doctor and not gone it would have been another year of waiting and wondering.I am glad that i stuck to my gut instinct and went forward with seeing the surgeon.I see her in fact later today .Got a call to come in at 1 twenty. Thank you for listening. Leah
Posts.Signature: I am a 48 year old women who has just had a biopsy that came back with abnormality cells.My Mother had breast cancer lost both breast to this.Would love to speak with other people who has been through this before. Leah
Posts.Title: Breast biopsy came back with abnormal cell findings .

Posts.Content: I will keep you updated and thanks so much for your replies back you have been very help full; Please take care, Leah
Posts.Signature: I am a 48 year old women who has just had a biopsy that came back with abnormality cells.My Mother had breast cancer lost both breast to this.Would love to speak with other people who has been through this before. Leah
Posts.Title: Breast biopsy came back with abnormal cell findings .

Posts.Content: Yes i did go back and see my surgeon again .The fluid biopsy that she did showed some funny cells in my left breast where the bigger cyst are.Tomorrow morning i am scheduled for surgery to go in take this cyst out and see if indeed it is cancerous.She called it a needle biopsy with mammagram help.Basically what i was told is i will be sent down for a ultra sound first that will pinpoint where the cyst is then a thing that looks ind of like a wire will be inserted into where the cyst is taped to hold in place then once it has been pinpointed i will go in for the surgery to have it removed.Said i will be in pain for a few days no heavy lifting . So now it is just a wait and see kind of thing .Hubby took the day off of work to go with me .take care of me afterwards .which i think is sweet of him. Kind regards ,leah Ps how have yoy been doing/

Posts.Title: Breast biopsy came back with abnormal cell findings .

Posts.Content: I just had a mammogram then ultra sound which found a mass in my left breast.Was sent to a surgeon for a biopsy this came back with abnormal cell findings.My surgeon called me to come back in.What could this mean?My Mother lost both breast to cancer.Should i be worried? Leah

Posts.Content: I sure will .I am hoping for the best maybe just wants to be resured all is well with me.From what i have heard about this surgeon she checks everything out throughly .I am so sorry for all that you have endured .I wish your future a very Healthy happy one. Thanks so much, Leah[/b]
